product.name: A/C Air Conditioner Compressor Fit for 2012-2017 Hyundai Accent, 2012-2017 Kia Rio 1.6L L4， with A/C Clutch,Replaces 977011R100, 977011R100DR, 977011W600
product.bullet_points:
• 【RELIABLE AC COMPRESSOR REPLACEMENT 】 Our compressors undergorigorous pressure testing to detect leaks, guaranteeing a long service life. Refrigerant Type: R134a;Pulley Groove Quantity: 6;Clutch Included: Yes; Oil Prefilled: 150 ml(10 ml tolerance)
• 【REPLACE PART NUMBER 】-977011R100, 977011R100DR, 977011W600
• 【PERFECT FIT】Automotive AC compressor and A/C clutch kit replacement fit for Hyundai Accent 1.6 L 2012-2017 , Kia Rio 1.6L 2012-2017 ,Please check the part number and our fitment chart before placing order.
• 【FUNCTION】The role of the AC compressor is to compress the refrigerant, circulate it, and change its temperature as it passes through the condenser. The A/C compressor allows your vehicle to reach the ideal temperature for a comfortable ride.
• 【IMPROVED COOLING 】- Our air conditioner compressor w/clutch is designed to deliver optimal cooling performance, ensuring that your car's interior remains comfortable even in hot weather. This can greatly enhance your driving experience, making your car more enjoyable to drive.
